body: Feature request to fail tests on workflow task failures.

comments.body: Unsure if this issue is referring to all SDKs (does not have checkboxes from https://github.com/temporalio/features/blob/main/.github/ISSUE_TEMPLATE/epic.md). I think this can be part of #322 for most SDKs and needs to be documented/clarified. This is a worker option I believe not an environment one (but those are one in the same in some SDKs).

title: TestWorkflowEnvironment - fail tests on workflow task failures
